#include<iostream>
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;
typedef unsigned long long ull;

ull pow(ull n,ull m)
{
    if(m==0)
        return 1;
    ull k,temp=pow(n,m/2)%M;
    k=(temp*temp)%M;
    if(m%2)
        return (n*k)%M;
    return k;
}
int main()
{
    ull t,m,n;
    ull k;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        k=(m*(m-1))%M;
        if(n==1)
            cout<<m<<endl;
        else if(n==2)
            cout<<k<<endl;
        else
            cout<<(k*pow(m-2,n-2))%M<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
